meaning_str.bing:
adv. 仔细地；小心翼翼的；诚惶诚恐地；颇有分寸地
网络. 小心地；认真地；谨慎地

仔细地；小心翼翼的；诚惶诚恐地；颇有分寸地

1.en: On coming down from his room at six, he looked carefully about to see if Drouet was present and then went out to lunch.
1.cn: 6点钟，他从房间下来时，仔细地看了看四周，杜洛埃不在。然后，他出去吃饭。

2.en: And he put the tin lantern carefully in the front corner of the wagon-box, where the sack of corn held it still.
2.cn: 然后他把小心的把锡灯挂在马车车厢前面的角落上，那里有一袋玉米可以让灯持续亮着。

3.en: Daily from subtle small start, do not expect the brilliant magic, the trick to see through the vanity, carefully observe their own heart.
3.cn: 每天从细微的小处着手，不要奢望神奇的辉煌，看穿这些虚荣的把戏，仔细观察自己的心吧。

0.en: No, not yet. They'll kill Toothless. No, Astrid we have to think this through carefully.
0.cn: 还不行，他们会杀死没牙，我们得仔细地考虑清楚。

1.en: Listen to me very carefully, my friend.

2.en: Before the ginger burns, put the fish carefully into the wok.
2.cn: 赶在生姜烧焦之前，小心地将鱼入锅。

3.en: I relied on a carefully regimented program of denial and wetting the bed.
3.cn: 我依靠我精心策划的计划，拒绝面对现实，还有尿床。

4.en: 54-09 call. Go ahead. Dispatch. Listen carefully. We have a rough location.
4.cn: 编号54-09汇报。收到。请求支援，听仔细了，只有大致地点。

5.en: Is this true, Will? No. We are carefully culling our records for these files.
5.cn: 这是真的吗？威尔。不，我们正在仔细筛选关于这些卷宗的档案记录。

6.en: We've discussed how important it is to reflect carefully after experiencing pain.
6.cn: 我们已经讨论过体验痛苦后仔细思考的重要性。

7.en: It is coated with one of the fastest-acting neurotoxins known to man, so very carefully.
7.cn: 这东西上面涂有对人类最致命的神经毒素之一，千万要小心。

8.en: Turn here. Listen carefully. If you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here. What?
8.cn: 这边转弯，好好听着，如果你完全按照我说的做，我可以帮你离开这里。你说啥？

9.en: Suzy Sheep is bouncing the basketball very carefully. Well done, Susie. Now, everyone try.
9.cn: 小羊苏西非常小心翼翼的拍着篮球。做得好，苏西。现在大家都来试试。

10.en: My son doesn't need your help. Tread carefully when you talk to your queen. You are my sister first.
10.cn: 我的儿子不需要你来管。注意语气，你可是在跟王后说话。别忘了你是我妹妹。

11.en: Carefully turn over the fish. Lovely, lots of juice coming out, lots of sweetness from this fish, it's great.
11.cn: 小心地把鱼翻面。煎得很好，出了很多水，鱼肉很甘甜，好吃极了。

12.en: I have spent my whole life trying to bring order to the universe by carefully planning every moment of every day.
12.cn: 我用了一生时间精心安排我每天该做什么，就是想要给这个世界带来秩序。

13.en: Ah, can we have our ball back please? Yes, but please play more carefully in future. Yes Mummy pig, sorry Mummy Pig.
13.cn: 我能把我的球拿回来吗？但是的，但是你下次玩的时候要更小一点。好的猪妈妈，对不起猪妈妈。

14.en: Hello? Listen carefully. I'm about to give you a set of instructions, which you must follow to the letter. Just a sec.
14.cn: 喂？听仔细了，我现在会给你一系列指示，你照着我说的一步步做。等会儿。

15.en: Right, listen to me very carefully, Kevin. The network owns you. They can sue you for damages. They could bankrupt you.
15.cn: 好了，仔细听我说，凯文。电视台是你的老板，他们会起诉你赔偿损失。他们会让你倾家荡产。

16.en: Grandpa Pig is going to moor the boat. The secret of mooring is to do it carefully. My, the bridge. What? Look behind you. Ah.
16.cn: 猪爷爷要把船给拴住。拴船的秘诀就在于要非常地小心。小心那座桥，小心你的？后面啊！

17.en: Now, you only get one shot to blow that audience away, so choose carefully from the list of songs I've selected for each of you.
17.cn: 你们只有一次机会征服台下的观众，所以你们要慎重选择我为你们列的曲目。

18.en: Your Majesty, consider your course of action carefully, seeking out good advice, and never forget the late words of the late Emperor.
18.cn: 陛下亦宜自谋，以咨诹善道，察纳雅言，深追先帝遗诏，

19.en: Because I believed your sister's indifferent to him. Indifferent? I watched them most carefully and realized his attachment was deeper than hers.
19.cn: 我认为你姐姐觉得他无关紧要，我觉得他的爱要比她更多。
